remarks: The range of a finitely supported function is finite.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Aug-2017.)
statement:
ffsrn.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. W ) $.
ffsrn.0 $e |- ( ph -> F e. V ) $.
ffsrn.1 $e |- ( ph -> Fun F ) $.
ffsrn.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( F supp Z ) e. Fin ) $.
ffsrn $p |- ( ph -> ran F e. Fin ) $.
